data.title: Dale Brown; Jim DeFelice Book & Series List
data.meta_description: A complete list of all Dale Brown; Jim DeFelice's books & series in order (18 books) (2 series). Browse plot descriptions, book covers, genres, pseudonyms, ratings and awards.
data.text:
Revolution

Sep-2000

/ Action Adventure
